text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Legal occupant" means an occupant who resides on the premises with the actual knowledge and permission of the landlord.
"Offender" means a person who commits an act of domestic violence or commits a sexual assault offense.
"Peace order" means an enforceable final peace order.
"Protective order" means an enforceable final protective order.

"Victim of domestic violence" means a person who is:
A victim of domestic abuse, as defined in § 4-501 of the Family Law Article; and
A person eligible for relief, as defined in § 4-501 of the Family Law Article.

"Victim of sexual assault" means a person who is a victim of:
A sexual crime under Title 3, Subtitle 3 of the Criminal Law Article;
Child sexual abuse under § 3-602 of the Criminal Law Article; or
Sexual abuse of a vulnerable adult under § 3-604 of the Criminal Law Article.
